Title: Tied to the Tracks
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Carolina Paiz, Molly Smith Metzler (executive story editor), Rebecca Angelo (staff writer), Lauren Schuker Blum (staff writer), Anthony Natoli (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: While Taystee sits down with a negotiator, Red and Blanca put their own plan into action. Gloria counsels Daya and asks Caputo for a favor.
